sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import Carousel from 'react-elastic-carousel' import Card from '../CarouselCard/CarouselCard' import './Carousel.scss' import carousel1 from '../../assets/carousel_1.png' import carousel2 from '../../assets/carousel_2.png' import carousel3 from '../../assets/carousel_3.png' const images = [ , , , , ] const breakPoints = [ {width: 300, itemsToShow: 1}, {width: 500, itemsToShow: 2}, {width: 768, itemsToShow: 3}, {width: 1200, itemsToShow: 4} ] function CarouselComponent() { return ( {images.map(key => )} ) } export default CarouselComponent
